ARABIC: هَٰذَا بَيَانٌ لِّلنَّاسِ وَهُدًى وَمَوْعِظَةٌ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is a clear explanation for all mankind, and guidance and admonition for those who have taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is a clear declaration for mankind, and a guidance and a warning for those who preserve themselves from evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is a plain exposition for men, and a guidance and admonition for the Godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This (Quran) is a reminder for the people and a guide and advice for the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is an explanation for mankind, a guidance and an advice to the pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is a plain statement for mankind, a guidance and instruction for the Muttaqin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is a clear statement for men, and a guidance and an admonition to those who guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is an exposition for mankind, and a guidance, and an admonition for such as are godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is a declaration for mankind, a guidance and an admonition unto those who ward off (evil)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This Quran is an exposition for the people and a guidance and admonition for those who fear God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This in exposition unto mankind and a guidance and an admonition unto the God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is an explanation for mankind, and a guidance and advice for the Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Here is a plain statement to men, a guidance and instruction to those who fear Allah!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This (the Quran) is a plain statement for mankind, a guidance and instruction to those who are Al-Muttaqun (the pious - see V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is a declaration to the people, a guidance and an admonition to the cautious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is a proclamation to humanity, and guidance, and advice for the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This [Qur'an] is a clear statement to [all] the people and a guidance and instruction for those conscious of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:138] This, Qur’ān, is an exposition for, all, mankind, and a guidance, from error, and an admonition for such as   are God-fearing, among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is a declaration for mankind) this Qur'an shows for mankind what is lawful and unlawful, (a guidance) from error (and an admonition) a counsel and proscription (unto those who ward off (evil)) ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies.
